title: Realistic Projectiles
description: The realistic projectiles project, was made to raise up ballistic simulation level at game, it use drag functions, the same used in real ballistic test, where each function is kindly refer to a drag model.
longDescription: Preview: youtu.be/6NNxdvkhFZU The realistic projectiles project, was made to raise up ballistic simulation level at game, it use drag functions, the same used in real ballistic test, where each function is kindly refer to a drag model. In addition the project has been set up with current cartridges values, where they have information that will be used to calculate its trajectory and power exerted at the time that entering in a material. Is included an implementation example in a demo First Person Blueprint, as well as everything you need to integrate easily in another project!
technicalDetails:
Features:
• Projectile based on ballistic functions, which increases the fidelity of simulation
• Clean and commented blueprints
• You can enter with your own custom content via Data Tables, to configure is easy, there is no much tasks to do
• Includes a demo map based on the First Person Blueprint Template

Number of Blueprints: 3
Number of DataTables: 2
Number of Enumerators: 1
Number of Curves: 7
Number of Meshes: 2
Number of Materials: 1
Number of Physics Materials: 24
Number of Structures: 2
Number of Textures: 1
Intended Platform: Windows, Linux
Platforms Tested: Windows
Documentation Included: No
Important\Additional Notes: Does not follow any kind of cosmetics, just a basic weapon. The values of cartiges presets are approximate and taken from unofficial sources. The penetration values given are not accurate, were made just to make a demonstration.
